      • compile

        public void compile​(String name,
                    byte[] contents,
                    String slug,
                    Author author)
             throws Exception
        Method to compile the parameters into an Author.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the input file.
        contents - The contents of the input file.
        slug - The Author's slug.
        author - The Author's entity to update.
        Throws:
        Exception - If any Exception is encountered.

      • compile

        public void compile​(String name,
                    byte[] contents,
                    String prefix,
                    String slug,
                    Article article)
             throws Exception
        Method to compile the parameters into an Article.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the input file.
        contents - The contents of the input file.
        prefix - The Article's path prefix.
        slug - The Article's slug.
        article - The Article's entity to update.
        Throws:
        Exception - If any Exception is encountered.

      • htmlRender

        public CharSequence htmlRender​(com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Document document,
                               URI prefix)
        See HtmlRenderer.render(Node,Appendable). Rewrites relative and FILE URIs to match those that are uploaded as part of the markdown document.
        Parameters:
        document - The Document to render.
        prefix - The prefix (as a URI).
        Returns:
        The CharSequence representing the rendered HTML.
